tweet: Another team from our district is state-bound! Good luck to the 8 time state champion @Football_Flyers this afternoon against the Prairie Ridge Wolves! Let’s make that 9 time state champs!

Today on #SmallBusinessSaturday we recognize the vital role America’s small businesses play in our communities. These businesses and the hard-working Southern Illinoisans that own them are the backbone of our local economy and communities! #ShopSmall pic.twitter.com/vWqp03FlZZ
.@TheBoroFootball Red Devils are state championship bound for the first time ever! Join me in wishing them good luck as they take on the Richmond-Burton Rockets in the 4A final tonight at 7pm!

As we gather around the table today, we give thanks for the many blessings in our lives. Tracy & I also ask you to join us in lifting a prayer for our brave men & women in uniform unable to spend this special day with their families. From our family to yours – Happy Thanksgiving! pic.twitter.com/sxHmef691W

Finishing the season with an impressive 18-2 overall record, @OFallon_Tennis had a historic year. With 5 players making the Southwestern Conference (SWC) All-Conference Teams, these girls left it all on the court. Congrats on a great season, ladies! http://bit.ly/2OnB6uP

Each Thanksgiving, Americans consume 46 MILLION turkeys! Whether yours is fresh, frozen, kosher, or organic, it’s important to protect yourself and your family from food-borne illnesses. Here are some helpful tips from @USDA on how to thaw, clean, and cook your turkey. pic.twitter.com/Lxx72VWJ0j

Pit Stop Pizza
592 State Highway 146
McClure, IL 62957

Good luck to @theBoroFootball, @MHSIndianFB & @Football_Flyers in the 4A, 5A & 6A IHSA football semifinals today! Hope you all play better than I did at this @CongFBGame practice! pic.twitter.com/WCndhZyxmD

This week, I met with Thomas Cramer from Dupo and other members of the @NSSGA. We had a great discussion about ways to improve our infrastructure and ensure builders have access to essential construction materials. Thank you for stopping by! pic.twitter.com/vHVoR7cLJQ

Back in September, the Mean Machine beat the Guards for the first time since 2009 in the bipartisan @CongFBGame. This week, I was proud to join my teammates to present the $70,000 raised to the US Capitol Police Memorial Fund, Our Military Kids & A Advantage 4 Kids. pic.twitter.com/thRQOd7Oo8

On #RuralHealthDay, I’m happy to share that Community Health & Emergency Services, Inc received a @usdaRD grant for a new telemedicine project to treat opioid abuse. Patients will be able to get care close to home so they can recover & live healthy lives. http://bit.ly/35pZuBz

A booming energy industry comes w/a need to get oil & gas to market safely. @TransportGOP approved my amendments to protect the environment, workers & residents by making it illegal to sabotage pipelines by turning valves or causing structural damage.  http://bit.ly/2XCrejS  pic.twitter.com/ub72jJLE1n

This morning, I joined a bipartisan group of veteran members of Congress to clean the Korean War Veterans Memorial. In a time where partisanship is rife in Washington, it was a great chance to come together to give back & reflect on the sacrifices made by our Korean War veterans. pic.twitter.com/pXgnRSMzef

As winter approaches, Southern Illinois farmers need a continued supply of propane to dry corn and heat barns full of livestock. I recently joined more than a dozen of my colleagues in asking @FERC to ensure Midwest farmers have the propane they need this winter. pic.twitter.com/fNJ7UOqxpK

Today marks the 100th birthday of the @FarmBureau. Thank you for all you’ve done to support farmers over the last century! https://twitter.com/FarmBureau/status/1194298811419701248 …

We owe a debt of gratitude to our nation’s bravest individuals — those who have served and given their lives in defense of our freedom. I was honored to speak at the Du Quoin Veterans Day ceremony this morning to say thank you and pay tribute to our Southern Illinois veterans. pic.twitter.com/j5SI0PgyNb

A few years back, a vet named Lieutenant Dan gave me a red & yellow bracelet – the colors of the @USMC. His request: that when I wear it, I remember for whom I work. On #VeteransDay, we join together to honor the 55,000 vets who call Southern IL home. http://bit.ly/36RfU7y
Happy Veterans Day! To the generations of men and women who have fought and sacrificed so much to keep us free, thank you for your service. pic.twitter.com/FOKbMBDUUq

The Shawnee Veterans Wall stands as reminder of the Southern Illinois veterans who were willing to give all to make sure freedom is handed down to the next generation. I was honored to join our community for the dedication ceremony this week. pic.twitter.com/HfHC2XbJ6h
As a Marine and the father of a Marine, I want to wish the @USMC a happy 244th birthday! Oorah! #SemperFidelis https://twitter.com/USMC/status/1193521187902459904 …
Good luck to the @MurphysboroHS @TheBoroFootball as they take on the Illinois Valley Central Grey Ghosts at home this afternoon! Let’s go Red Devils!

It was standing room only as our Woodlawn community honored a member of the Greatest Generation, Mr Lyle Endicott. Enlisting in the @USNavy as a pilot after Pearl Harbor, he provided support during Iwo Jima & Okinawa. Lyle, thank you for your service & happy 98th birthday! pic.twitter.com/2r7xb30MU5

Having served 3 tours in Iraq, Sergeant Cross took part in the 2004 Battle of Mosul & has earned numerous commendations & medals, including a Bronze Star & Combat Medical Badge. Mike, thank you for your service, sacrifice & for sharing your story w/ me today.

The Veterans History Project is a wonderful chance for vets to share their stories so they are preserved for generations. I sat down w/ Retired Sergeant First Class Mike Cross to discuss his 14 years of service as an artilleryman & combat medic in the @USArmy & @USNationalGuard. pic.twitter.com/uO69uM5y8T

Had a great visit to @RHS_Shells yesterday! I enjoyed seeing how dedicated the middle schoolers are to their anti-bullying program, stopped by the student-run Café de Shell, and wished the Cross Country Team good luck as they left for their state meet. Thanks for having me! pic.twitter.com/U8EWKB3Vra

During Veterans Small Business Week, we celebrate the entrepreneurial spirit of the vets who own 2.5 million small businesses in the US. This morning, I toured the Brehm Preparatory School in Carbondale to learn about their Individualized Holistic Education Plan. Every student has unique needs, and this program has done a great job giving them the tools to succeed both inside and outside of the classroom. pic.twitter.com/aT3rQX7vGI
